Shivah::

Shivah used a private frecuency and send a comm link to 
Bullet "Bullet, be carefull they have a virus inside thier bodies and 
I don't like that you get infected... Godd fighters like you are 
difficult to find "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Bullet heard the message and used his pint sized brain to figure 
out that
> the favor Blaze asked for and the enemy that Shivah had sent him 
after were

favor and

> situation boss and I'm on my way to the enemys location." He raised 
his gun
> high as he reached the outside of the door that had Razor Claw and 
Ender
> trapped "I'll slag them whenever you wanna open the door."
